title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 489.17 - Abuse, neglect and significant incidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 489.17 - Abuse, neglect and significant incidents

State Regulations

Family-type home for adults shall be subject to and must
comply with the requirements as set forth in Part 433 of this Title and any
other applicable regulations including, but not limited to, 14 NYCRR Part
703. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
489.17

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
